name: REAPER IN TRAINING
description:
play as a demon-in-training who has high hopes but not-so-high realities. prove yourself as worthy of the REAPER role!

thank you to noidstruct for making the music! it's very catchy

CONTROLS:

a - walk left

d - walk right

space - jump

LMB - reap

enter - confirm

made for mini jam 120 in 3 days, so it's lackluster

don't expect an update or anything
